titles.title: LEAF Act of 2025
LEAF Act of 2025
Local Employment Access for our Forests Act of 2025

A bill to amend the Healthy Forests Restoration Act of 2003 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to give preference to local contractors in awarding contracts to carry out certain hazardous fuel reduction projects on Federal land.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
